title: Radon: The Invisible Gas
description: A quick win: understand Radon: The Invisible Gas.

hook.text: Radon is a radioactive gas that seeps into homes from the ground. You cannot smell or see it.

buildup.text: It comes from natural uranium decay in soil and rock beneath buildings.
